definition: conforming to accepted standards of social or professional behavior
details:
adjective
- conforming to accepted standards of social or professional behavior
= example: conforming to accepted standards of social or professional behavior
- adhering to ethical and moral principles
= example: adhering to ethical and moral principles
= synonyms: honourable, honorable
- of or relating to the philosophical study of ethics
= example: of or relating to the philosophical study of ethics
